text: @realDonaldTrump We are dealing with a pandemic and you are tweeting about Micheal Flynn. Really?????? People are getting sick, losing weeks of pay and business. Nobody cares about Micheal Flynn. This is ridiculous. It’s his own fault what has happened to him. He’s a criminal.
